attributes.action: Ban all airlines operating to and from the UK from  overbooking flights.
attributes.background: Ban all airlines operating to and from the UK from the practice of overbooking flights. Alternatively passengers should be informed at the time of booking that the flight is overbooked and that they will be treated as standby passengers. The current pract

rejection.details:
The text of the petition appears to be incomplete. 

Before you resubmit your petition, please note that Parliament will be dissolved at 00.01am on Wednesday 3 May. That means that  all parliamentary business – including petitions – will stop on 3 May until the new Parliament returns. 

From 3 May, you won’t be able to sign or start petitions on this site. Petitions opened before 3 May will be available for people to read on the site. They will not be reopened after the election. You’ll need to start your petition again when the site reopens after the election.

We don’t know exactly when the site will open again. You can follow us on Twitter @HoCPetitions for updates, or check back on the petitions site for news if you prefer.
